entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning then sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 9.
